Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@46.224.32.229 "
# 1. Systemd servisi olutur
cat > /etc/systemd/system/menupark-api.service << ''EOF''
[Unit]
Description=MenuPark API
After=network.target

[Service]
WorkingDirectory=/var/www/menupark-api
ExecStart=/usr/bin/dotnet /var/www/menupark-api/MenuPark.API.dll
Restart=always
RestartSec=10
SyslogIdentifier=menupark-api
User=www-data
Environment=ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production
Environment=ASPNETCORE_URLS=http://localhost:5000

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

# 2. www-data kullan覺c覺s覺na yetki ver
chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/menupark-api

# 3. Servisi etkinletir ve balat
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl enable menupark-api
systemctl start menupark-api

# 4. Servis durumunu kontrol et
systemctl status menupark-api --no-pager
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
$conn = ''Server=94.73.145.8,1433;Database=u2503900_canli;User Id=u2503900_canli;Password=PR7Yvj5@A-qa3=4:;TrustServerCertificate=True''

$sql = @''
IF NOT EXISTS \(SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID\(''Customers''\) AND name = ''Latitude''\)
BEGIN
    ALTER TABLE Customers ADD Latitude DECIMAL\(10,7\) NULL;
END

IF NOT EXISTS \(SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID\(''Customers''\) AND name = ''Longitude''\)
BEGIN
    ALTER TABLE Customers ADD Longitude DECIMAL\(10,7\) NULL;
END

IF NOT EXISTS \(SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID\(''Customers''\) AND name = ''RequireLocationVerification''\)
BEGIN
    ALTER TABLE Customers ADD RequireLocationVerification BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
END

IF NOT EXISTS \(SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID\(''Customers''\) AND name = ''LocationToleranceMeters''\)
BEGIN
    ALTER TABLE Customers ADD LocationToleranceMeters INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 150;
END

SELECT ''OK'' as Result
''@

Invoke-Sqlcmd -ConnectionString $conn -Query $sql
")
